education.title: Networking administration and security
education.description: During my final year of studies, I moved to Reims to be with my girlfriend. At the University of Reims, I had the opportunity to choose between two Master's programs: Programming and Network Administration. Eager to broaden my expertise and explore new areas of computer science, I opted for Network Administration, which allowed me to gain a deeper understanding of infrastructure and systems beyond my programming background.

education.title: Software architecture and engineering
education.description: Master specialized in software architecture and engineering, I discovered more about design patterns, component programming, distributed architecture, ...

education.title: Computer Science Bachelor
education.description: I discovered old technologies like xslt or unfunny things like Make! But all these things were useful in companies with old projects.

education.title: Computer Science Associate
education.description: This is my best years as studient. It was my first step in the real life and I could study what I had been passionate about since high school. I learned base of programming, object-oriented programming, design patterns, database, graph structures, ...
